question_text:
The point V(3,-5) is translated 5 units up. What are the coordinates of the resulting point, V'?
_
backend_description: A coordinate grid showing point V at position (3, -5). Students need to find the new coordinates when V is translated 5 units up.
solution: Move the point up 5 units. Add 5 to the y-coordinate to get (3,0).
